title: China 's share of global gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2012 to 2024
summary: Overall Share of global GDP has increased over the Year.
Share of global GDP is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2021.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Share of global GDP, of value 20.18 was reached at Year 2021
The lowest Share of global GDP, of value 15.91 was reported at Year 2013
